original_text: Meanwhile, when a crowd of many thousands had gathered, so that they were trampling on one another, Jesus began to speak first to his disciples, saying: “Be on your guard against the yeast of the Pharisees, which is hypocrisy.
korean_text: 그 동안에 무리 수만 명이 모여 서로 밟힐 만큼 되었더니 예수께서 먼저 제자들에게 말씀하여 이르시되 바리새인들의 누룩 곧 외식을 주의하라

sentences.original_text: Meanwhile, when a crowd of many thousands had gathered
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 수천 명의 무리가 모였을 때

sentences.original_text: so that they were trampling on one another
Jesus began to speak first to his disciples
Be on your guard against the yeast of the Pharisees
